column4: I'm trying to configure the QT JACK control interface, and whenever i try to start the server, it says it can not connect to the Jack server as a client
you need to install jackd, too.
was jackd started by qjackctl, or did you start it prior (by hand)?
I need verbose debug spew pastebinned.
pastebin.com is taking abnormally long to load
what app are you attempting to connect?
I would try doing it from a Terminal instead of through qjackctl just to test that jackd's not at fault.
is that not just qtjackctl trying to connect to the jack server?
and you can connect your jack-aware app to the running jackd instance?
